definition: knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: In the latter period, they were armed with Winchester rifles, clubs and knives.
sentences.chinese: 在後階段，她們還配備了連發槍以及軍棍和軍刀。

sentences.english: XDoc is the Swiss army knife for all things XML.
sentences.chinese: XDoc是一個處理XML的所有事情的瑞士軍刀。

sentences.english: The most recognizable aspect of a U. S. military wedding is the crossing of the swords, or sabers .
sentences.chinese: 美國軍事婚禮習俗中最值得提及的是軍刀拱門。

sentences.english: The child's knife with rounded blade is already in production.
sentences.chinese: 其中兒童圓刃軍刀已經投入生產了。

sentences.english: Our cars are viewed as Swiss army knives.
sentences.chinese: 汽車就是我們心目中的瑞士軍刀。

sentences.english: He recommends that people carry a multitool, by which he means some version of the Swiss army knife.
sentences.chinese: 他說人人都有一把多用工具，其實他指的是瑞士軍刀。

sentences.english: They also had their own version of the Swiss Army knife.
sentences.chinese: 他們也有自己眼中的瑞士軍刀。

sentences.english: It is truly the Swiss army knife of software tools.
sentences.chinese: 它真的是軟件工具的瑞士軍刀。

sentences.english: Many people's web-site are like a Swiss army knife with every damn tool in there pulled out and exposed.
sentences.chinese: 很多人的網站就像一個打開所有工具的瑞士軍刀。

sentences.english: Premier Yu presents a military sword to President Stroessner of Paraguay .
sentences.chinese: 俞院長贈送軍刀給巴國史託斯納爾總統。

sentences.english: A Swiss army knife without a blade?
The brain is like a Swiss Army Knife, full of different tools.
sentences.chinese: 大腦就像一把瑞士軍刀，擁有各種不同工具。

definition: also written 機槍|机枪/machine gun
to rake with machine gunfire/to strafe/to machine-gun down
to shoot dead (with a gun, or bow and arrow)
